item.title: Npc Shout
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i figured out how to make npcs shout with the
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1203 && misc.random2(5) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “!Welcome Home!”;
}

But only one of my npcs of that type spam, how will i make the other 3 spam it aswell.
thanks for reading hope you can help
